org.openimaj.image.text.extraction.swt

Class LineCandidate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.text.extraction.swt.LineCandidate

  • public class LineCandidate
extends Object
    This class models a candidate line of text, with one of more word candidates within it, from the SWTTextDetector.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
